articles.title: Liverpool show signs of Premier League top-four potential - ESPN India
articles.description: It looks like it'll only get better for Liverpool from here, but for Newcastle United it has to get worse because of the mess Nick Pope made.
articles.content: NEWCASTLE, England -- Liverpool blew the race for Champions League qualification wide open by cruising to a 2-0 win at Newcastle on a day when the home side played with ten men for 68 minutes followi… [+11089 chars]
